title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC REVISED
description: This RFC proposes a detailed specification for the ProjectHealthMonitor tool. The following requirements are suggested: 1) Desired features, including real-time progress tracking, team morale indicators, and bottleneck detection. 2) User roles, such as project manager, team member, and stakeholder. 3) Data sources, like project management tools (e.g., Jira, Asana), communication platforms (Slack, Microsoft Teams), and development repositories (GitHub, GitLab). 4) Integration points with external APIs for data collection and analysis. Please review and provide feedback for further refinement.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and communication between modules.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, build tools, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

title: Design and Implement Data Collection Mechanisms
description: Develop mechanisms to collect project data from various sources, such as version control systems, issue trackers, and collaboration tools.

title: Design and Implement Data Storage and Processing
description: Design and implement a data storage solution and mechanisms for processing and analyzing the collected data.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for visualizing project health metrics and providing insights to users.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect sensitive project data and ensure secure access to the tool.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the ProjectHealthMonitor tool, including installation guides, user manuals, and API references.

title: Implement Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the tool.
dependencies: Design and Implement Data Collection Mechanisms
Design and Implement Data Storage and Processing

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the ProjectHealthMonitor tool to a production environment and implement monitoring and alerting mechanisms to ensure its reliable operation.
